channel.title: Oxidative Stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Oxidative Stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: AdMsrB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04318 Gene Symbol: AdMsrB1 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AdMsrB1 is a novel ethylene-regulated gene expressed in ripening kiwifruit.

item.title: ALT1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g57110 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0779400 Gene Symbol: ALT1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnERF2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnERF2.4 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like (ERF2.

item.title: BZR1-3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb204870 Gene Symbol: BZR1-3 Gene Name: BZR-transcription factor 3 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CaPIMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIMT1 Gene Name: L-isoaspartyl methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: PROTEIN L-ISOASPARTYL METHYLTRANSFERASE1 (CaPIMT1) from chickpea mitigates oxidative stress-induced growth inhibition of Escherichia coli.

item.title: CaPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methlyesterase inhibitor protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper pectin methylesterase inhibitor protein CaPMEI1 is required for antifungal activity, basal disease resistance and abiotic stress tolerance.

item.title: CAT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb002510 Gene Symbol: CAT2 Gene Name: catalase2 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CmSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmSOS1 Gene Name: The Na+/H+ antiporter SOS1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of CmSOS1 confers waterlogging tolerance in Chrysanthemum.

item.title: CrNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase1 Genome: Species: Citrus reshni Functional Descriptions: Molecular cloning and characterization of CrNCED1, a gene encoding 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase in Citrus reshni, with functions in tolerance to multiple abiotic stresses.

item.title: CsTIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g023108 Gene Symbol: CsTIP2|1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Expression of the citrus CsTIP2|1|CsTIP2|1 gene improves tobacco plant growth, antioxidant capacity and physiological adaptation under stress conditions.

item.title: DHAR1;OsDHAR1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g02530 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0116100 Gene Symbol: DHAR1 OsDHAR1 OsDHAR Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FaGAST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGAST2 Gene Name: GAST-like gene2 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaGAST2, a strawberry ripening-related gene, acts together with FaGAST1 to determine cell size of the fruit receptacle.

item.title: FaGT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT2 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaGT2: a multifunctional enzyme from strawberry (Fragaria × ananassa) fruits involved in the metabolism of natural and xenobiotic compounds.

item.title: GmDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmDREB1 Gene Name: dehydration responsive element binding protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmDREB1 improves salt tolerance in transgenic wheat and leaf protein response to high salinity.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g18850 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0300400 Gene Symbol: JIOsPR10 OsPR10 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.title: NbCML30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf07608g00007 Gene Symbol: NbCML30 Gene Name: calmodulin-like protein 30 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Tobacco mosaic virus hijacks its coat protein-interacting protein IP-L to inhibit NbCML30, a calmodulin-like protein, to enhance its infection.

item.title: PacCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsTrxo1 Gene Name: mitochondrial thioredoxin1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Response of mitochondrial thioredoxin PsTrxo1, antioxidant enzymes, and respiration to salinity in pea leaves.

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: ScAREB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.11G016910 Gene Symbol: ScAREB4 Gene Name: ABA-responsive element binding protein 4 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: ScAREB4 promotes potato constitutive and acclimated freezing tolerance associated with enhancing trehalose synthesis and oxidative stress tolerance.
